title: Lima's Magic Water Circuit Show.
description: Experience an exciting tour filled with lights, colors, and music at "The Magic Water Fountains Park," recognized as "the world's largest fountain complex in a public park." This attraction is a must-visit while in Lima City. Our team is ready to guide you through this impressive complex, featuring thirteen captivating fountains that blend movement, lights, sounds, and images
all_descriptions: Experience an exciting tour filled with lights, colors, and music at "The Magic Water Fountains Park," recognized as "the world's largest fountain complex in a public park." This attraction is a must-visit while in Lima City. Our team is ready to guide you through this impressive complex, featuring thirteen captivating fountains that blend movement, lights, sounds, and images

ItineraryThis is a typical itinerary for this productStop At:Magic Water Circuit of the Reserve Park, Jirón Madre de Dios S/N, Lima 15046, PeruGet ready for an exciting tour! Your adventure begins at your hotel or accommodation, where our professional driver and tour guide will pick you up. We’ll head to the Magic Water Circuit Park, and as soon as you arrive, you'll be captivated by the vibrant colors, music, and stunning fountains that fill the park, a recognized Guinness World Record site.

Your tour guide will lead you on a leisurely walk through the park, sharing interesting stories and facts about each fountain and the park as a whole. You won't want to miss the impressive "Lights, Water, and Sound Show," which takes place at the Fantasy Fountain. This magnificent fountain is 120 meters long and over 20 meters wide, providing a perfect stage for a spectacular hydraulic choreography performance. At times, the water from this fountain transforms into a large screen, showcasing landscapes of Peru accompanied by Peruvian music.
After your visit, your tour guide and driver will ensure you return safely to your hotel.Duration: 1 hour 45 minutes

Jirón Madre de Dios 333, Lima 15046, PeruDear Client, please select this option if you would like to meet the group at the main entrance of the Magic Water Park, which is located at door number 3 in front of the National Stadium.
End:This activity ends back at the meeting point.

reviews.title: So Cool
reviews.text: This is such a fun experience. Our guide was fantastic, making sure we were seeing everything, and especially a great vantage point for the show. Best of all is skipping the line. We were even able to arrange for them to drive us to the airport afterwards. Definitely recommend.

reviews.title: Excellent 3 Day Private Tour of Lima
reviews.text: Our family of 4 was on an "Inca Discovery Cruise" in November and we were in Lima for 3 days.  I contacted Mabel at Apullay Tours about 2 months before our cruise to ask if she could assist us with organizing a 3 day private tour of Lima for us.  Mabel did an excellent job on our itinerary, and we saw and experienced so many things in Lima over our 3 days there.Mabel arranged for a van with our very capable driver, Cirilo, who did an amazing job navigating us through some very narrow streets and heavy traffic.  Our guide, Pamela, had excellent English and she was very well qualified as a guide, having completed a 2 year course in tourism management and tour guiding. She provided us with insights into Peru's long history with its indigenous peoples, the Spanish conquest and battles for liberation, as well as contemporary history of Peru.  We are grateful to Pamela for providing us with so much knowledge of Peru and its people.Our son has cerebral palsy and we had brough along on our cruise a fold-up wheelchair to get him around the many cobblestone streets on the trip.  Cirilo was very helpful with driving us to the most optimal drop-off locations and assisting with the fold-up wheelchair, which was greatly appreciated.Some of the 3-day tour highlights were:- Chorrillos: The Morro Solar - One of the city's highest points with an exceptional view of Lima;- Kennedy Park and Love Park in Minaflores;- Magic Water Park and Laser Show that shows the history of Peru projected onto the water fountain's mist;- Local market tour in Surquillo with a delicious sampling of local Peruvian fruit;- Walk through Barranco, a wonderful artistic / bohemian community and art gallery visit- Delicious Peruvian seafood dinner at Cala, an excellent ocean-side restaurant and a perfect place to view the sunset- Visit to the Gold Museum which is an extensive display of Incan gold artifacts and pottery.  Also has a weapons museum on the top floor that was also impressive.- Lunch at El Bolivariano, an authentic Peruvian food experience which was also delicious.It was truly a memorable 3 days in Lima for our family, thanks to the Apullay Tours team.  I would highly recommend their tours to anyone wishing to have an exceptional tour of Lima and to make the most of your time there.

reviews.title: Beautiful.
reviews.text: The most heart warming displays of water fountains. The water show was mesmerizing. A must see for sure during the evening hours to fully enjoy the experience.

reviews.title: Magical evening of fountains and history!!
reviews.text: Pamela was an awesome tour guide!!  She provided excellent details about history during the tour.  Pick up and drop off was very simple and professional.  No waiting in lines.  Highly recommended and worth the expense.

reviews.title: Excellent tour
reviews.text: I went a water circuit  by light tour in central Lima at 8 PM on April 7,2024, excellent tour guide and driver ! strongly recommend!

reviews.title: Amazing!!!
reviews.text: We couldn‘t miss out on the magic water fountain so we booked a tour with „Get Your Guide“.  Luckily we were the only ones signing up and had basically a private tour.Mable from „Apullay Tours“ was a lovely guide and Ernesto was a great driver that picked us up all the way down in Barranco.They drop you off right at the entrance and let you skip the whole queue so there is no waiting involved. Mable gave us a short summary of the film that plays on the waterscreen so you have a good idea what you are about to see. Thanks to her knowledge about the schedule of the park we went directly to the other fountains and had plenty of time to do awesome photos. She has a good idea of posing and made very good pictures of us. She explained a lot about the the culture and made the expiereience unforgettable. It took less than a minute once we left the park and Ernesto was already there to pick us up. They drop you off wherever you want and we had a great time chatting in the car. Mable has great humor and we had a great time driving back to barranco. With some recommendations for bars and restaurants we left the car happy as we could be!Overall an amazing expierience and we would recommend this tour to everybody that visits Lima! Mi cuerpo necesitar moverse!

reviews.title: Highly recommended!
reviews.text: Excellent tour. This is a must when visiting Peru. From the communication of pick up/drop off to the tour guide & drivers - everything was perfect. Thank you Mabel & Cesar for making our time in Lima so memorable!

reviews.title: Family from Illinois, USA
reviews.text: Our experience was unforgettable. The customer service is excellent and Mabel is a very talented tour guide that makes every moment of the tour like an adventure!!! I really recommend this tour for everyone. Mabel, our tour guide was very knowledgeable and showed us amazing sights.
